attributes.action: force insurance companies to make minimum payouts of the insured amount on failed endowment policies at maturity date
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: insurance companies are failing to meet the target minimum to pay the mortgage because of their poor investment selection and hefty commissions paid to agents. They often fail to pay compensation because of 'technicalities' They should be made to retain, out of their vast profits, a contingency fund sufficient to ensure mortgages are paid. In other words, they should pay out the death benefit value of the policy if the policy fails at maturity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
